TopicTitle: Trim won't reset, possible control bug?

Articles.Content:
So recently I've had this issue where these pink arrows would appear on my pitch, roll, and yaw and it would basically force my ship to spin uncontrollably on the mark(s). I wasn't sure what those were at the time but after Google searching it seems to be this feature called trim. However when I went through the in game controls and again went to google they all told me the same thing, on Cursor controls use LB+A and on Radial use LB+Left Stick button. I tried switching between both control schemes and inputting the controls to reset trim but they won't dissapear. I was so close to getting to Gilly and now I have to go back to the planning board and either wait for Eve to make a full orbit or modify the rocket because of this.
